'''12w19a''' is the fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.3.1]], released on May 10, 2012.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120511172445/https://www.mojang.com/2012/05/minecraft-snapshot-12w19a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 12w19a|website=mojang.com}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Cocoa_Age_2_(S)_JE1.png|36px]] '''[[Cocoa]]'''
* Added cocoa pods to [[jungle]]s.
** Generate on the side of jungle wood.
** Have 3 stages of growth, and the number of cocoa beans dropped depends on stage of growth.

'''{{Animate|Cut_Sandstone_JE1_BE1.png;Chiseled_Sandstone_JE1_BE1.png|36px}}[[Sandstone]] and [[File:Smooth_Stone_Slab_JE1_BE1.png|36px]] smooth stone variants'''
* Now have their proper names (e.g. "Smooth Sandstone").

=== World generation ===
'''[[World type]]'''
* Added "[[Large Biomes]]" type.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
[[File:Cocoa Beans JE2.png|36px]]'''[[Cocoa beans]]'''
* Changed texture.

[[File:Cookie JE1 BE1.png|36px]]'''[[Cookie]]s'''
* Now recover 2 points of hunger rather than 1.

=== General ===
[[File:Bonus Chest.png|44px]] '''[[Bonus chest]]'''
* [[Torch]]es now spawn around bonus chests if each side has a block at the same height around it.

'''[[Server.jar|Server jar]]'''
* The server jar now accepts the [[Tutorial:Setting up a Java Edition server#Server options|command-line argument]] <code>--bonusChest</code>.

== Fixes ==
'''6 bugs fixed'''
* Enchanting [[bow]]s and [[sword]]s work again (Other tools now have tooltips, etc. once more).
* [[The End]] and [[the Nether]] generate normally again.
* [[Item repair]] works again.
* Starting a game in [[Creative]] no longer starts in [[Survival]] mode.
* [[Bonus chest]]s work correctly again.
* Particles no longer activate wooden [[pressure plate]] with an [[arrow]] on it.</onlyinclude>
* Door opening and closing sound effects work correctly again.

== Trivia ==
* In this version, when loading a singleplayer world, one needs to put <code>minecraft.zip/server/minecraft_server.jar</code> into <code>.minecraft/server</code> manually to continue loading.
